Text: Update Formosa MillionJohn It looks like they have fixed their problems and we should be getting our money through accounting tonight Jean Can you make sure that Carol is talking to Greg Whiting in Gas Accounting Thanks Original Message From Mrha Jean Sent Tuesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Gossett Jeffrey C Subject FW Formosa Million There are no accounting issues I am assuming that Nowlan is retrading the deal I will set up a meeting with Wes Mrha Original Message From Gossett Jeffrey C Sent Tuesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Mrha Jean Subject Formosa Million John Global Markets is maintaining that there are accounting issues with the million Should we get Faith Killen or Wes to get this wrapped up

PL PenaltiesPhillip ended up taking the hit on the pl because he said he was facing a revolt if it went to Grigsby

Total Commodity for Natural Gas Cc Do you want me to start having Total commodity for Natural Gas on the morning reports inclusive of natural gas positions that power and other groups have on I have noticed that we have violations based on the new risk management policy to take all gas positions company wide into a number
